sources.title: 1935 Die Blonde Carmen( Martha Eggert, Ida Wüst, Leo Slezak,wolfgang Liebeneiner, Hans Leibelt, Curt Vespermann)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1935.. Die blonde Carmen.  U.a mit Ida Wüst,Wolfgang Liebeneiner und Martha Eggerth in ihrer besten Rolle(meiner Meinung nach).. Witziger Film!

metadata.Plot: Maria Varkas, a famous operetta star tired after her last show, takes an incognito holiday with her assistant Ilka at a small hotel in the Bayern mountains. There they listen how Otto, a composer, and his friend Josef, music writer, criticize theatre divas. Maria, taking it personally, wants to give them a lesson. So she becomes Josephine, a simple peasant girl who will try Otto's patience and make Josef's delight alike. Both friends are writing their next operetta, Die Blonde Carmen, set in Spain. And this peasant girl sings so beautifully, but she can't act at all...
metadata.Actors: Mártha Eggerth, Wolfgang Liebeneiner, Ida Wüst
